short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the background image of the IFS landing login page based on the environment URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Managing multiple IFS Cloud environments can be challenging. Whether you're navigating between CFG, UAT, STG,  or production, IFS Environment Background Changer is here to streamline your workflow by allowing you to dynamically customize the background images of your IFS Cloud login pages based on the environment you're accessing.
